main event: On the evening of October 6, 1967, a deputy sheriff in Oelwein, Iowa reported seeing several unidentified flying objects emitting bright white lights.
interesting points: The deputy sheriff observed the objects for several minutes before they accelerated and disappeared from view., The objects were estimated to be at an altitude of about 2,000 feet., The objects were described as round or elliptical in shape., Witness Mr. John Doe reported seeing two additional unidentified objects hovering at about 500 feet., The objects were silent and displayed no visible means of propulsion.
sighted object: unidentified flying objects emitting bright white lights
witness description: deputy sheriff and a civilian witness (Mr. John Doe)
